Interface IInputDevice

A more filtered, usable version of an ILowLevelInputDevice

Namespace: Snowflake.Input.Device
Assembly: Snowflake.Framework.Primitives.dll
Syntax
public interface IInputDevice

Properties

Gets a friendly name for the controller (Xbox Controller, or Wii Remote, etc etc)

Declaration

System.String

DeviceIndex

Gets the device index differs from the enumeration number that it is the index in a set of the device rather than all devices. For example, if the device is an Xinput device and is the 3rd input device, this index would be 2 in the set of input devices.

Declaration
int ? DeviceIndex { get; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.Nullable<System.Int32>
